directions: Place salmon in a shallow microwave bowl. Add 2 cups water. Cover and microwave on high 7-9 minutes or until salmon is cooked as desired. Remove from water; refrigerate until cool.
In a small bowl, combine remaining ingredients (except lime). Refrigerate 30 minutes.
Serve salmon surrounded by the salsa and lime wedges.
title: Chilled Salmon With Summer Tomato Salsa
